RelatedSentence: At Central Christian Church , on the same Midtown corner where it was established in 1889 , even the stained glass windows hold meaning .

Mayor Pro Tem and Zone 1 Councilman Jeff Seifried said Central Christian has been instrumental to this community .
It 's been a place for people to lean on in the hard times and the good times , and we 're all thankful , Seifried said .

Musser spoke fondly of the Rev. Mike McGinnis , who came to the church in the early '60 s , when attendance was faltering .
When Mike came to our church in 1963 , he was told that Central Christian was a dying church , Musser said .
